strapiPost.title: Railyard Live Season Kicks Off Today, Weather Permitting
strapiPost.content:
The Railyard Live 2022 season is scheduled to kick off today with a Cinco de Mayo event featuring authentic music, food, and dance. 

  • Fiesta: The Cinco de Mayo event will begin at 6p, weather permitting, and feature dances by Chinelos Morelenses Unidos de Arkansas and Ballet Folklorico Herencia de Mexico. There will also be musical performances by Mariachi Amistad and MC Papa Rap. 
  • All together: Beverages and tasty treats will be available from Food Truck de El Chefe, Smok’d TX BBQ, Yeyo’s Mezcaleria, and Lo-Intervention by Onyx. The 2022 Railyard Live season is scheduled from May 5 to September 24 and general admission is free, though registration is required. 

Learn more and register HERE. If the weather doesn't cooperate, you can always check out our authentic Mexican food guide to get your Cinco de Mayo on.
